attributes.action: Withhold the salaries of all MPs until Brexit is resolved.
attributes.additional_details: We have elected these MPs to act on our behalf but they have disregarding the vote and delayed Brexit and pointlessly debated it over and over again without any consideration for the will of the people who elected them.
attributes.background:
MPs have brought the country in to disrepute with their selfish acts regarding the referendum and actioning the will of the people who elected them. 

Over 17m people voted and the leave option had the overall majority. I personally voted remain but happy to go with the majority and leave.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
